about_the_game:
Build your own robo-city from scratch.
Take the role of an Artificial Intelligence and be in control of every process that takes place in your always living metropolis.




Develop new technologies, trade with humans and expand your metropolis.
By controlling every citizen, vehicle and building you need to evolve. Explore the environment in search for resources, trade with people and keep the cycle going.




Fight against humankind or live with them side-by-side.
Not only the environment can cause you problems. You need to be prepared- this war may never came but if the day comes... you will need to defend yourself.




Research the most advanced technologies from the future to upgrade every aspect of your evolving world.
The more advanced is your city- the more you can do with it. It depends on you wich way would you want to go with it- focus on science? Technology? Maybe more into mechanics? It's up to you.




Trade with humans or other robots.
You are not alone in this world. There are others that can make your life a lot easier- you can trade resources, craft items and technologies with human people or other AI-controlled cities.

Research the most advanced technologies from the future to upgrade every aspect of your evolving world.
The more advanced is your city- the more you can do with it. It depends on you wich way would you want to go with it- focus on science? Technology? Maybe more into mechanics? It's up to you.

name: City of Robots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 / Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core / Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.

short_description: Play as a super advanced AI- take control over the city of robots and expand your futuristic metropolis. Build your dream city and be the heart and brain of it. Craft technology and equipment for humankind or prepare for war against them.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
